title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
description:
Senior Full-Stack Developer - 5+ Years Experience

We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Developer with expertise in:
- JavaScript/TypeScript and modern frameworks (React, Node.js)
- Database technologies (MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
- Cloud platforms (AWS, Docker, Kubernetes)
- API development and microservices architecture
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

Responsibilities include leading development projects, mentoring junior developers, and architecting scalable solutions.

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of full-stack development experience
- Proficiency in React and Node.js
- Experience with MongoDB and SQL databases
- Knowledge of cloud deployment (AWS/Azure)
- Strong understanding of REST APIs and microservices
- Experience with version control (Git)
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

title: Frontend React Developer
description:
Frontend React Developer - 3+ Years Experience

We are looking for a skilled React developer to join our frontend team:
- 3+ years of React development experience
- Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
- Experience with state management (Redux, Context API)
- Knowledge of modern build tools (Webpack, Vite)
- Experience with responsive design and CSS frameworks
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain React applications
- Collaborate with UX/UI designers
- Optimize applications for performance
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Participate in code reviews

title: Backend Node.js Engineer
description:
Backend Node.js Engineer - 4+ Years Experience

Seeking an experienced backend engineer for our API development team:
- 4+ years of Node.js development experience
- Strong knowledge of Express.js framework
- Experience with MongoDB and Mongoose ODM
- Understanding of RESTful API design principles
- Knowledge of authentication and authorization
- Experience with Docker and containerization
- Familiarity with AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda)

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable APIs
- Database design and optimization
- Implement security best practices
- Write comprehensive tests
- Deploy and maintain production systems

title: Data Scientist
description:
Data Scientist - Machine Learning Focus

We are seeking a Data Scientist with machine learning expertise:
- Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of experience in data science and machine learning
- Proficiency in Python and data science libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn)
- Experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Knowledge of statistical analysis and data visualization
- Experience with SQL and database management
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Responsibilities:
- Develop predictive models and algorithms
- Analyze large datasets to extract insights
- Create data visualizations and reports
- Collaborate with engineering teams
- Present findings to stakeholders

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
DevOps Engineer - Cloud Infrastructure

Looking for a DevOps engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure:
- 4+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
- Strong knowledge of AWS services (EC2, ECS, RDS, S3)
- Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
- Experience with monitoring tools (CloudWatch, Prometheus)
- Linux system administration skills

Key Duties:
- Design and maintain cloud infrastructure
- Implement automated deployment pipelines
- Monitor system performance and reliability
- Ensure security best practices
- Troubleshoot production issues
